title: Muba Babel United F.C.
text:
Muba Babel United Football Club (formerly known as Babel United) is an Indonesian <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> club based in <a href="Musi%20Banyuasin%20Regency">Musi Banyuasin Regency</a>, <a href="South%20Sumatra">South Sumatra</a>. The club play their home games at <a href="Serasan%20Sekate%20Stadium">Serasan Sekate Stadium</a>.
History.
In March 2020, <a href="Babel%20United%20F.C.">Babel United</a> and <a href="Muba%20United">Muba United</a> merging to form Muba Babel United.
